original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Lanka Sathosa has taken steps to reduce the prices of three types of rice.
Accordingly, the price of one kilogram of local white Kekulu rice has been reduced by Rs.10 and its new price is Rs.165.
The price of a kilogram of local white nadu rice has been reduced by Rs.7 and accordingly, its new price is Rs.168.
The price of one kilogram of red Kekulu rice has also been reduced by Rs.2 and its new price is Rs.137.
